en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 山东省地方国家权力机关。

nodes.id: 山东省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing committee of the Shandong Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1945年由中国共产党设置的山东省行政管理机构，是1949年成立的山东省人民政府的前身。
description.en: The administrative body of Shandong Province established by the Chinese Communist Party in 1945, and the predecessor to the Shandong Provincial People's Government founded in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府在1955年至1967年期间的名称。
description.en: The name of the Shandong Provincial People's Government from 1955 to 1967.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间山东省的权力机关，取代了山东省人民委员会。
description.en: The organ of power in Shandong Province during the Cultural Revolution, which replaced the Shandong Provincial People's Committee.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府组成部门之一。
description.en: One of the constituent departments of the Shandong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 由山东省发展和改革委员会管理的部门管理机构。
description.en: A departmental management agency administered by the Shandong Provincial Development and Reform Commission.

description.en: A departmental management agency administered by the Shandong Provincial Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府直属机构之一。
description.en: One of the directly affiliated agencies of the Shandong Provincial People's Government.

description.en: A departmental management agency administered by the Shandong Provincial Administration for Market Regulation.

description.zh-cn: 由山东省人民政府办公厅管理的部门管理机构。
description.en: A departmental management agency administered by the General Office of the Shandong Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府是中华人民共和国国务院的业务下级机构。
description.en: The Shandong Provincial People's Government is professionally subordinate to the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府是山东省人民代表大会的组织下级机构。
description.en: The Shandong Provincial People's Government is organizationally subordinate to the Shandong Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.target: 山东省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府是山东省人民代表大会常务委员会的组织下级机构。
description.en: The Shandong Provincial People's Government is organizationally subordinate to the Standing Committee of the Shandong Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府是中华人民共和国山东省的省级地方行政机关。
description.en: The Shandong Provincial People's Government is the provincial local administrative organ of Shandong Province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月成立的中共山东省政府是山东省人民政府的前身，后者于1949年12月正式成立。
description.en: The CPC Shandong Provincial Government, established in August 1945, was the predecessor of the Shandong Provincial People's Government, which was formally established in December 1949.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府于1955年3月改称山东省人民委员会。
description.en: The Shandong Provincial People's Government was renamed the Shandong Provincial People's Committee in March 1955.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民委员会于1967年3月被山东省革命委员会取代。
description.en: The Shandong Provincial People's Committee was replaced by the Shandong Provincial Revolutionary Committee in March 1967.

description.zh-cn: 1979年12月，山东省革命委员会被撤销，复设山东省人民政府。
description.en: In December 1979, the Shandong Provincial Revolutionary Committee was abolished, and the Shandong Provincial People's Government was re-established.

position.en: Deputy Secretary of the Provincial Party Committee

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Provincial Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 王桂英是致公党党员。
description.en: Wang Guiying is a member of the China Zhi Gong Party.

relationships.source: 山东省人民政府办公厅

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府办公厅是山东省人民政府的下属机构。
description.en: The General Office of Shandong Provincial People's Government is a subordinate body of the Shandong Provincial People's Government.

relationships.source: 山东省发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 山东省发展和改革委员会是山东省人民政府的组成部门。
description.en: Shandong Provincial Development and Reform Commission is a constituent department of the Shandong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 山东省能源局由山东省发展和改革委员会管理。
description.en: Shandong Provincial Energy Bureau is managed by the Shandong Provincial Development and Reform Commission.

description.en: Shandong Provincial Animal Husbandry and Veterinary Bureau is managed by the Shandong Provincial Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs.

description.en: Shandong Provincial Marine and Fishery Law Enforcement and Supervision Bureau is managed by the Shandong Provincial Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs.
